content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, thank you for considering my property. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 1,200 Euros would be reasonable. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a lower price if you have any specific concerns or requirements. Is this a price that works for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would be happy to negotiate with you. I was hoping for something less than 1,200 Euros per month. Would you be open to a lower price?
name: Max Müller

content: I understand your interest in negotiating the rental price. While I would like to maximize my gains, I am also interested in finding a fair and mutually beneficial arrangement. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 800 Euros would be more reasonable. However, I am open to discussing other terms and compromises to arrive at a price that works for both of us. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would be happy to accept 800 Euros per month. That is a fair price for the apartment. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility.

I would like to sign a lease agreement with you. Please let me know the procedures for signing the lease agreement.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Max Müller
name: Max Müller

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment and for agreeing to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. I am glad we could come to an agreement that works for both of us.

In order to sign the lease agreement, I will need you to provide some basic information such as your name, address, and employment status. I will also need you to sign a security deposit agreement to cover any potential damages to the property.

Once all of the necessary information has been provided, I can send you the lease agreement for you to review and sign. Once signed, the lease will become legally binding and you will be responsible for paying the monthly rental price of 800 Euros.

Thank you again for your business and I look forward to working with you.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine.
name: Heinrich Heine
